DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to assess the distribution and spread of four different vehicle formulations in the vagina. In-vivo data will be obtained regarding each vehicle formulation at various time points after insertion of the gel into the vagina.
DOC.brief_title: An Imaging Trial of the Distribution of Topical Gel Formulations in the Human Vagina
DOC.criteria: 18 to 45 year old women nonpregnant healthy abnormal finding on pelvic exam pregnant or breastfeeding allergy to intravaginal products history of claustrophobia
